## Snakemake pipeline

[Snakemake](http://snakemake.readthedocs.io/en/stable/index.html) was used to generate a pipeline to process all of the RNA-Seq data. 

The pipeline is viewable on [github](https://github.com/rnabioco/martin/tree/master/pipeline)
